---

The `RatingBar` component will now only be displayed if the category is not 'queued'. This is handled by adding a `v-if="ratingData?.category !== 'queued'"` condition to the `RatingBar` in the template. Let me know if you need any further adjustments.

_**User (2025-05-11 07:24Z)**_

don't display it if the category is missing

---

_**Agent (mode Agent)**_

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="edit_file">

<details><summary>Tool use: **edit_file** • Edit file: src/components/AlbumItem.vue</summary>

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 1, lines removed: 1

```diff
@@ -189,5 +189,5 @@
          &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
-       &lt;RatingBar v-if="ratingData?.category !== 'queued'" :priority="ratingData?.priority" :category="ratingData?.category" /&gt;
+       &lt;RatingBar v-if="ratingData?.category &amp;&amp; ratingData?.category !== 'queued'" :priority="ratingData?.priority" :category="ratingData?.category" /&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;
      &lt;div class="album-link"&gt;
```

</details>

</tool-use>

---

The `RatingBar` will now only be displayed if `ratingData?.category` exists and is not `'queued'`. This ensures it won't show if the category is missing or set to `'queued'`. Let me know if you need any further changes.

---
